short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A serene escape above the clouds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skybound Bliss transforms your browser's new tab into a serene escape above the clouds. With a breathtaking background featuring cascading waterfalls, vibrant flowers, and a stunning view of mountain peaks in a sea of clouds, this extension offers a tranquil browsing experience. It includes a real-time clock, weather updates, and a section for the latest news headlines, ensuring you stay informed while immersed in natureâ€™s beauty.
